attributes.title: Yeah❤️Boolies👺
attributes.review: i got this app because i was promised that when i downloaded it dr.spencer reid would come to my side and fall in love with me and want to marry me. i waited for him to come, but he didn’t even arrive. while i was waiting for him to arrive, the amount of energy this app took caused a brick to fall off of my roof and kill my pet zebra. this app isn’t good for the environment. also, could u please put a 🤪Cheeto😼 warning because i got scared😹😿

attributes.title: ITS A SCAM‼️
attributes.review: 𝑆𝑜 𝑖 𝑠𝑎𝑡 ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑒 𝑦𝑒𝑠𝑡𝑒𝑟𝑑𝑎𝑦 𝑠𝑐𝑟𝑜𝑙𝑙𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑡ℎ𝑟𝑜𝑢𝑔ℎ 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑎𝑝𝑝 𝑠𝑡𝑜𝑟𝑒🥰🍓𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑜𝑓 𝑐𝑜𝑢𝑟𝑠𝑒, 𝑏𝑒𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑔𝑟𝑒𝑎𝑡 𝑡𝑟𝑢𝑚𝑝 𝑐ℎ𝑒𝑒𝑡𝑜 𝑜𝑜𝑚𝑝𝑎 𝑙𝑜𝑜𝑚𝑝𝑎 𝑠𝑝𝑎𝑔ℎ𝑒𝑡𝑡𝑖 𝑟𝑢𝑠𝑡𝑦 𝑡𝑜𝑒𝑑 𝑠𝑢𝑝𝑝𝑜𝑟𝑡𝑒𝑟 𝑖 𝑎𝑚😌✨🧚 𝑖 𝑑𝑒𝑐𝑖𝑑𝑒𝑑 𝑡𝑜 𝑔𝑜 𝑎ℎ𝑒𝑎𝑑 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑔𝑖𝑣𝑒 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝 𝑎 𝑑𝑜𝑤𝑛𝑙𝑜𝑎𝑑.😃🔥𝑇ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑒 𝑎𝑟𝑒 𝑐𝑜𝑛𝑠𝑒𝑞𝑢𝑒𝑛𝑐𝑒𝑠 𝑡𝑜 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝‼️ 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑠𝑒𝑐𝑜𝑛𝑑 𝑖 𝑜𝑝𝑒𝑛𝑒𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝, 𝑎 𝑔𝑖𝑎𝑛𝑡 ℎ𝑜𝑟𝑛𝑒𝑡 𝑐𝑎𝑚𝑒 𝑓𝑙𝑦𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑡𝑜𝑤𝑎𝑟𝑑𝑠 𝑚𝑒.😰😓 𝑇ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝 𝑖𝑠 𝑛𝑜𝑡 𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑦 𝑎 𝑠𝑐𝑎𝑚 𝑏𝑢𝑡 𝑖𝑡 ℎ𝑎𝑠 𝑝𝑢𝑡 𝑜𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑟 𝑝𝑒𝑜𝑝𝑙𝑒𝑠 𝑤𝑒𝑙𝑙 𝑏𝑒𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑎𝑡 𝑟𝑖𝑠𝑘. 𝑇ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑖𝑠𝑛𝑡 𝑠𝑜𝑚𝑒 𝑝𝑜𝑙𝑖𝑡𝑖𝑐𝑎𝑙 𝑎𝑝𝑝 𝑏𝑢𝑡 𝑖𝑡 𝑖𝑠 𝑖𝑛𝑠𝑡𝑒𝑎𝑑 𝑎𝑛 𝑎𝑟𝑏𝑦𝑠 𝑚𝑒𝑛𝑢😰😭𝑖𝑡 𝑎𝑠𝑘𝑒𝑑 𝑓𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑦 𝑝𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑜𝑛𝑎𝑙 𝑖𝑛𝑓𝑜 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑎 𝑤𝑎𝑟𝑛𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑝𝑜𝑝𝑝𝑒𝑑 𝑢𝑝 𝑠𝑎𝑦𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑖𝑓 𝑖 𝑑𝑖𝑑𝑛𝑡 𝑜𝑟𝑑𝑒𝑟 𝑓𝑟𝑜𝑚 𝑎𝑟𝑏𝑦𝑠, 𝑖𝑡 𝑤𝑜𝑢𝑙𝑑 𝑟𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑎𝑠𝑒 𝑚𝑦 𝑝𝑒𝑟𝑠𝑜𝑛𝑎𝑙 𝑖𝑛𝑓𝑜𝑟𝑚𝑎𝑡𝑖𝑜𝑛 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑠𝑡𝑒𝑎𝑙 𝑚𝑦 𝑘𝑖𝑑𝑠.😡😤𝐼 𝐷𝑂𝑁𝑇 𝐸𝑉𝐸𝑁 𝐻𝐴𝑉𝐸 𝐾𝐼𝐷𝑆‼️🤡𝑖 𝑔𝑜𝑡 𝑠𝑜 𝑠𝑐𝑎𝑟𝑒𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑎𝑡 𝑖 𝑑𝑒𝑙𝑒𝑡𝑒𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑎𝑝𝑝 𝑜𝑢𝑡 𝑜𝑓 𝑓𝑒𝑎𝑟 𝑓𝑜𝑟 𝑚𝑦 𝑙𝑖𝑓𝑒. 𝑇ℎ𝑒𝑛 𝑖 𝑤𝑜𝑘𝑒 𝑢𝑝 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑚𝑜𝑟𝑛𝑖𝑛𝑔, 𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑒 𝑖 𝑤𝑎𝑠, 𝑠𝑖𝑡𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑒, 𝑏𝑏𝑞 𝑠𝑎𝑢𝑐𝑒 𝑜𝑛 𝑚𝑦 𝑡𝑖𝑡𝑡𝑖𝑒𝑠.🥴 𝑊ℎ𝑎𝑡 𝑎 𝑚𝑜𝑟𝑡𝑖𝑓𝑦𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑒𝑥𝑝𝑒𝑟𝑖𝑒𝑛𝑐𝑒. 𝐼 𝑑𝑜𝑛𝑡 𝑒𝑣𝑒𝑛 ℎ𝑎𝑣𝑒 𝑏𝑏𝑞‼️😰 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑛𝑘 𝑖𝑡 𝑠𝑡𝑜𝑝𝑠 𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑟𝑒 𝑟𝑖𝑔ℎ𝑡?🤔 𝑊𝑒𝑙𝑙 𝑦𝑜𝑢𝑟 𝑤𝑟𝑜𝑛𝑔.😈 𝐼 ℎ𝑎𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑎𝑝𝑝 𝑓𝑜𝑟 𝑜𝑛𝑙𝑦 𝑇𝑊𝑂 𝑑𝑎𝑦𝑠 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑖 𝑔𝑜𝑡 𝑎 𝑐𝑎𝑙𝑙 𝑓𝑟𝑜𝑚 𝑚𝑦 𝑚𝑎𝑛𝑎𝑔𝑒𝑟.🙄𝐻𝑒 𝑠𝑎𝑖𝑑 𝑖 𝑤𝑎𝑠 𝑓𝑖𝑟𝑒𝑑 𝑓𝑟𝑜𝑚 𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑘𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑎𝑡 𝑚𝑐𝑑𝑜𝑛𝑎𝑙𝑑𝑠 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑖𝑛𝑠𝑡𝑒𝑎𝑑 𝑖 ℎ𝑎𝑣𝑒 𝑡𝑜 𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑘 𝑎𝑡 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑛𝑎𝑠𝑡𝑦 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑑𝑖𝑠𝑔𝑢𝑠𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑎𝑟𝑏𝑦𝑠.😭✌️ 𝐼 𝑠𝑎𝑖𝑑 “𝑠𝑜 𝑛𝑜 ℎ𝑒𝑎𝑑?“ 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑟𝑒𝑤 𝑚𝑦 𝑝ℎ𝑜𝑛𝑒 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑏𝑟𝑖𝑘𝑒 𝑚𝑦 𝑠𝑘𝑎𝑡𝑒𝑏𝑜𝑎𝑟𝑑.🥺 𝑀𝑦 𝑓𝑎𝑚𝑖𝑙𝑦 𝑤𝑒𝑛𝑡 𝑚𝑖𝑠𝑠𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑎𝑠 𝑤𝑒𝑙𝑙 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑦 𝑙𝑒𝑓𝑡 𝑎 𝑛𝑜𝑡𝑒 𝑡ℎ𝑎𝑡 𝑠𝑎𝑖𝑑 “𝑙𝑜𝑜𝑘 𝑎𝑡 𝑎𝑙𝑙 𝑡ℎ𝑜𝑠𝑒 𝑐ℎ𝑖𝑐𝑘𝑒𝑛𝑠 𝑝.𝑠 𝑤𝑒 𝑔𝑜𝑡 𝑡𝑎𝑘𝑒𝑛 𝑏𝑦 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑐ℎ𝑒𝑒𝑡𝑜 𝑜𝑜𝑚𝑝𝑎 𝑙𝑜𝑜𝑚𝑝𝑎 𝑘𝑎𝑚𝑜𝑜𝑡𝑎 𝑝𝑎𝑡𝑜𝑜𝑡𝑎 𝑡𝑟𝑢𝑚𝑝 𝑐𝑢𝑙𝑡 𝑐𝑜𝑚𝑒 𝑠𝑎𝑣𝑒 𝑢𝑠“😰 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑖 𝑟𝑎𝑐𝑒𝑑 𝑏𝑎𝑐𝑘 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑓𝑜𝑢𝑟𝑡ℎ 𝑎𝑠 3 𝑦𝑒𝑎𝑟 𝑜𝑙𝑑 𝑔𝑖𝑟𝑙 𝑠𝑎𝑡 𝑏𝑦 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑤𝑖𝑛𝑑𝑜𝑤 𝑠𝑡𝑎𝑟𝑒𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑎𝑡 𝑚𝑒 𝑑𝑤𝑎𝑑 𝑖𝑛 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑒𝑦𝑒 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑠𝑎𝑖𝑑 “𝑖 𝑠𝑚𝑒𝑙𝑙 𝑏𝑒𝑒𝑓, 𝑖 𝑠𝑚𝑒𝑙𝑙𝑙𝑙 𝑏𝑒𝑒𝑒𝑓“ 𝑑𝑜𝑛𝑡 𝑔𝑒𝑡 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑎𝑝𝑝 𝑖𝑓 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑤𝑎𝑛𝑡 𝑡𝑜 𝑤𝑎𝑘𝑒 𝑢𝑝 𝑤𝑖𝑡ℎ 𝑏𝑏𝑞 𝑠𝑎𝑢𝑐𝑒 𝑜𝑛 𝑦𝑜𝑢𝑟 𝑡𝑖𝑡𝑡𝑖𝑒𝑠 𝑤ℎ𝑒𝑛 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑑𝑜𝑛𝑡 𝑒𝑣𝑒𝑛 ℎ𝑎𝑣𝑒 𝑏𝑏𝑞 𝑠𝑎𝑢𝑐𝑒.😔✋𝑖𝑡𝑠 𝑛𝑜𝑡 𝑤𝑜𝑟𝑡ℎ 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑡𝑟𝑎𝑢𝑚𝑎

attributes.title: Ban Tiktok? More Like Ban This!
attributes.review:
What with all the craziness going on in our world, I downloaded this app as an escape back to simpler times. You know-- back to a kind old city in Germany in 1933. I wanted to scroll through while I groomed my moustache, and maybe even talk to good, like-minded people like me. Never have I been so disappointed, though!
The app was tricky to navigate and hard to use! When it texted me a verification code, I texted it back and asked it what Trump thought of all those nasty women and libtards who want to destroy our history, and it didn’t respond! I’m starting to worry that Trump doesn’t have a plan for us after all. :(
Whoever is texting me from the app shows no emotion whatsoever. I’m starting to think that they might be a sociopath like the Führer-- I mean Trump. Anyways, I’m throwing away my red armband-- my bad, hat-- and buying a Biden shirt instead. Sleepy Joe can take my vote! At least he cares, unlike Trump.
If you want to serve the fatherland, don’t download this app; vote Biden 2020!
Sincerely,
Anne T. Faa (It’s my grandmother’s name, don’t laugh! We built this country after taking it from the uncivilized savages! I'm not privileged, though-- I've had a very hard life. Somebody called me a boomer one time.)
PS-- the app tried to offer me a complimentary MAGA hat. “MAGA” is such a stupid slogan; why would I want a hat that says “witch” when translated into Latin? I don’t think we should indoctrinate the children and make them think that unholy, dark magic is okay! We’re not all witches; Betsy Devoss doesn’t speak for all of us.

attributes.title: ChiNesE ApP
attributes.review: I was at my cousins👯‍♀️ house🏡 when a giant troll🦧 came up to my window🌅 and vomited🤮 on our heads🙆‍♀️. After cleaning up, we opened up the app again to see that there was i giant button that looks like harry styles💁🏼‍♂️ head. Obviously i HAD to press it, and it took me to my settings🧮 and messed them all up. It turned everything off🚫 and i couldn't turn it back🙅‍♀️. Then once i went off of the app📲, my lock screen was a picture of a giant turd💩 on Donald trumps hay🌞, oh i mean hair🦁. Naturally, i knew he did this on purpose because he wants everyone to think🤦‍♀️ about him at every moment so i understand. But i was annoyed enough so i left my room🏠 with the app📲 opened🎬 and my brother👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 had a horse🐴 face on so i told him to take it off and he couldn't. At that moment, i knew it was the doing of this app📞 because nothing📵 it does is reversible🔙. So i opened the app back up and there was a shiny purple🟣 button at the top that said take me to instagram. I LOVE💖 instagram so i pressed it only to see👀 that my feed contained exactly 74 pictures of Donald🦆. Ironically, that is how old Trump is. I wanted to see 👁 👄 👁 if i was powerful🧚 enough so i pressed the three🔘🔘🔘 dots at the top⬆️ and there was no❌ delete🗑 option. Keep in mind, all of this happened within the first 15 minutes🕓 of having this app📲 on my phone📱. Whatever you do, don't download this app. I still have it because of corse, Trump never gives up so it doesn't delete🗑. I messaged my friend and she said👩 that lil old Donald🦆 forced the rest of the board to download a “cHinEse VirUS”.🦠 into it so he can make my phone stop🛑✋ working properly. The only reason it got even one star was because my phone was completely unusable so my dad🎅 was forced to buy me an iPhone 11. Thank you for your time Donald🦆 but it wasn't worth it Making ppl hate you by banning tik tok🕑.
